00020 #define __UNINITIALIZED__ (-1)
00021 
00022 class WaveTrack;
00023 
00024 class EffectReverse:public Effect {
00025 
00026  public:
00027    EffectReverse();
00028 
00029    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00030       return wxString(_("Reverse"));
00031    }
00032 
00033    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00034       std::set<wxString> result;
00035       result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#TimelineChanger"));
00036       return result;
00037    }
00038 
00039    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00040       return wxString(wxT("Reverse"));
00041    }
00042 
00043    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00044       return wxString(_("Reversing"));
00045    }
00046    
00047    virtual bool Process();
00048 
00049  private:
00050    bool ProcessOneClip(int count, WaveTrack* track,
00051                    sampleCount start, sampleCount len, sampleCount originalStart, sampleCount originalEnd);
00052    bool ProcessOneWave(int count, WaveTrack* track, sampleCount start, sampleCount len);
00053  };
